Partner With Us

As a community healthcare center our mission is to provide care for all irrespective of the their financial capacity. WeAt WeCare-Ng we partner with other organizations in different ways. We appreciate your generosity and contributions to any of our on-going projects. We also welcome additional opportunity to expand services into other areas of societal needs.
